metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010091 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: tinymce 4.7.11, 4.7.12 is affected by: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation. The impact is: JavaScript code execution. The component is: Media element. The attack vector is: The victim must paste malicious content to media element's embed tab.

criterions.comment: tinymce: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
